statements: UPDATE inventory_management SET input_quantity = 10, input_supplier = 'Supplier A' WHERE input_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_management SET input_type = 'Electronics', input_quantity = 5 WHERE input_name = 'Laptop'
UPDATE inventory_management SET input_quantity = 20, input_supplier = 'Supplier 1' WHERE input_id = 101
UPDATE inventory_management SET input_name = 'Item 2', input_type = 'Type B', input_quantity = 50 WHERE input_id = 102
UPDATE seeds SET quantity = 100, harvest_period = 'Summer' WHERE seed_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE fertilizers SET nutrient_content = 'High', quantity = 50 WHERE fertilizer_id = '87654321-e89b-12d3-a456-426614178900';
UPDATE seeds SET quantity = 100, harvest_period = 'Summer' WHERE seed_id = '7b0f6f2e-6c07-4dbf-820a-3ba6d52bc3a8';
UPDATE fertilizers SET nutrient_content = 'NPK: 10-20-10', quantity = 50 WHERE fertilizer_id = '4a57f65c-a702-4c16-8c7d-8145bdd9d97c';
UPDATE seeds SET quantity = 100 WHERE seed_id = 1;
UPDATE fertilizers SET manufacturer = 'ABC Company' WHERE fertilizer_id = 3;
UPDATE seeds SET quantity = 100, expiration_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE seed_name = 'Wheat';
UPDATE fertilizers SET quantity = quantity + 50, expiration_date = '2023-10-15' WHERE manufacturer = 'AgriChem';
UPDATE seeds SET quantity = 100 WHERE seed_id = '3c17d3e6-a26d-4efd-8695-3b0243c56bd1';
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 50 WHERE item_id = '44e5ba53-8d80-4e51-9031-628b6a75f4a2' AND item_type = 'fertilizers';
UPDATE seeds SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE seed_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 50 WHERE item_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' AND item_type = 'fertilizers';
UPDATE seeds SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE seed_id = 1;
UPDATE pesticides SET price = 15.5, quantity = quantity - 5 WHERE pesticide_id = 3;
UPDATE seeds SET quantity = quantity + 5, price = price * 1.1 WHERE seed_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity - 10 WHERE product_id = 3 AND warehouse_id = 2;
